a.n: The Black Crowes - The Black Crowes: Freak'n'Roll - Live In San Francisco

p.d: Shot live at the famous Fillmore in San Francisco in August 2005, this is The Black Crowes caught at their very best. After taking a break to pursue solo ventures in 2002 their 2005 tour became one of the hottest tickets of the US summer. With a set featuring all their greatest hits and some stunning acoustic versions in the middle of a two and a half hour show performed by one of the greatest live bands of all time, this is a concert simply not to be missed. Features all their best known tracks including Jealous Again, Sting Me, She Talks To Angels, Seeing Things, Hard To Handle, Remedy and many more.
